Tangshan Meteorological Observatory issued a blue warning for strong wind at 15:53 on December 26, 2024. It is expected that from tonight to tomorrow afternoon, all counties and districts in Tangshan will experience northwest winds of level 4-5, with gusts of level 6-7. The wind force on the coastal sea surface will be even stronger, reaching level 5-6, with gusts of level 7-8. Citizens are requested to take precautions, close doors and windows, reinforce structures such as hoardings, scaffolding, billboards, etc. that are easily blown by the wind, and properly place outdoor items that are easily affected by strong winds. Water operations and passing ships in relevant waters should take active response measures, such as returning to port to avoid the wind or sailing around. Pedestrians should try to ride bicycles as little as possible, and do not stay under billboards, temporary structures, etc. when it is windy. Relevant departments and units should pay attention to fire prevention in forests and grasslands.
49:
**Yecheng County Meteorological Observatory issues yellow warning signal for road icing**

Yecheng County Meteorological Observatory issued a yellow warning signal for road icing at 22:45 on December 26, 2024: It is expected that from the night of December 26 to the 27th, Yecheng County will have road icing that will affect traffic. Please ask relevant departments to do a good job of prevention in accordance with their duties, drivers should pay attention to road conditions and drive safely; pedestrians should try to ride bicycles as little as possible when going out, and pay attention to anti-skid.

According to the China Meteorological Administration's regulations Regulations on the Issuance and Dissemination of Meteorological Disaster Warning Signals, road icing warning signals are divided into three levels, represented by yellow, orange and red respectively. The yellow warning signal indicates that road icing that may affect traffic may occur within 12 hours. 

Please pay attention to weather changes, take precautions, and ensure travel safety.
51: According to the blue temperature warning signal issued by the Zherong County Meteorological Observatory, Zherong County is expected to experience a significant drop in temperature, with the lowest temperature dropping by 6 to 8°C, and in some high-altitude towns and villages reaching -3 to -1°C, accompanied by frost and ice. According to the Management Measures for the Issuance and Dissemination of Meteorological Disaster Warning Signals issued by the China Meteorological Administration, meteorological authorities at all levels are responsible for the management of the issuance, removal and dissemination of warning signals within their administrative regions. Local people's governments at all levels should strengthen the construction of warning signal infrastructure, establish smooth and effective warning information release and dissemination channels, expand the coverage of warning information, and organize relevant departments to establish meteorological disaster emergency mechanisms and systems. Therefore, governments at all levels and relevant departments in Zherong County are requested to take effective measures in a timely manner to do a good job in meteorological disaster prevention and avoid or reduce the losses caused by meteorological disasters. At the same time, citizens are reminded to add clothes to keep warm, take cold and anti-slip measures, pay attention to traffic safety, and pay attention to the latest meteorological information released by the meteorological department.

The extreme lowest temperature will occur in the early morning of the 29th, reaching -1 to 1°C, and even lower in mountainous areas. Please keep warm and take precautions.

**Defense Guide**:

* **Agriculture, aquaculture, and animal husbandry**: Take cold prevention measures such as anti-frost and freezing to minimize losses.
* **Public**: Add clothes to keep warm, especially the elderly, children, and the weak. 

**Please pay attention to the latest weather information and take precautions**.
53:
**According to the regulations of the China Meteorological Administration, meteorological disaster warning signals are divided into four levels, represented by blue, yellow, orange and red, among which the yellow warning signal represents the heavy level**.

**According to the warning information issued by the Jiaxian Meteorological Observatory, the local towns and streets such as Ciba Town, Zhayuan Township, Xuedian Town, Likou Town, Zhuangtou Town, and Huangdao Town will be affected by strong winds, with an average wind force of more than level 8 and gusts of more than level 9**. 

**Residents in the above-mentioned areas are requested to pay attention to the following matters**:

* **Do a good job of wind prevention, close doors and windows, reinforce fences, scaffolding, billboards and other structures that are easily blown by the wind, properly place outdoor items that are easily affected by strong winds, and cover building materials**.
* **Stop outdoor activities and outdoor dangerous operations such as high altitudes, and people in dangerous areas and residents of dangerous houses should try to move to sheltered places**.
* **Take active response measures for water operations and passing ships in relevant waters, strengthen port facilities, and prevent ships from breaking anchor, running aground and colliding**.
* **Cut off outdoor dangerous power supplies, properly place outdoor items that are easily affected by strong winds, and cover building materials**. 
* **Airports, highways and other units should take measures to ensure traffic safety, and relevant departments and units should pay attention to forest and grassland fire prevention**. 

**Please pay close attention to the latest warning information issued by the meteorological department, and take defensive measures in accordance with relevant requirements to ensure personal and property safety**.

It is expected that Taojiang County will have moderate haze in the next 24 hours, which is prone to moderate air pollution. Citizens are requested to take precautions and reduce outdoor activities. According to the Regulations on the Issuance and Dissemination of Meteorological Disaster Warning Signals, haze warning signals are divided into two levels, represented by yellow and orange respectively. The standard for the yellow haze warning signal is: haze with visibility less than 3,000 meters may appear within 12 hours, or haze with visibility less than 3,000 meters has appeared and may continue. The defense guide is: drivers drive carefully; due to the obvious reduction in air quality, personnel need to take appropriate protection; patients with respiratory diseases should try to reduce going out, and wear masks when going out.

**Measures for the issuance and dissemination of meteorological disaster warning signals**: 

According to the Measures for the issuance and dissemination of meteorological disaster warning signals, meteorological stations under meteorological authorities at all levels shall issue warning signals in a timely manner, and update or cancel warning signals in a timely manner according to weather changes, and inform the people's government and relevant departments and disaster prevention and mitigation agencies at the same level at the same time. Radio, television and other media and fixed networks, mobile networks, the Internet and other communication networks shall cooperate with meteorological authorities to disseminate warning signals in a timely manner, use real-time warning signals directly provided by meteorological stations under meteorological authorities, and indicate the name and issuance time of the meteorological station that issued the warning signal. The content of the warning signal shall not be changed or deleted, and the dissemination of meteorological disaster warning signals shall not be refused, and false or outdated meteorological disaster warning signals shall not be disseminated. 

Please pay attention to meteorological warning information, take precautions and ensure safety.

**Regulations on the Issuance and Dissemination of Meteorological Disaster Warning Signals** stipulate that meteorological stations under meteorological authorities at all levels should issue warning signals in a timely manner, and update or cancel warning signals in a timely manner according to weather changes, and notify the people's government and relevant departments and disaster prevention and mitigation agencies at the same level at the same time.
97:
**Nanjiang County Meteorological Observatory continues to issue a blue frost warning signal**: Affected by strong cold air, it is expected that in the next 48 hours, the ground minimum temperature in Guanba Town, Jizhou Street, Gongshan Town, Xialiang Town, Pinghe Town, Guangwushan Town, Qiaoting Town, Shenmen Township, Guimin Town, Guanlu Town, Xingma Town, Guanmen Town, Shitan Town, Gaoqiao Town, Heping Town, Houjia Town, Tuanjie Township, Gaota Town, Bamiao Town, Chixi Town, Hongguang Town, Tianchi Town, Yangba Town, Ganchang Town, Dahe Town, Changchi Town, Shahe Town and other towns (streets) in Nanjiang County will drop below 0℃ and may continue, which will have an impact on agriculture and animal husbandry.

**Please take precautions**:

* The agricultural department should guide farmers to take anti-frost measures for crops, vegetables, flowers, fruits, forestry breeding, etc.
* Rural grassroots organizations and farmers should pay attention to local frost warning information so that they can take protective measures in time.
* The public should add clothes to keep warm and prevent colds. 

**Defense Guide**: 

* The government and agricultural and forestry authorities should make preparations for frost prevention in accordance with their duties. 
* Certain protective measures should be taken for crops, vegetables, flowers, fruits, and forestry breeding. 
* Rural grassroots organizations and farmers should pay attention to local frost warning information so as to take measures to strengthen protection.
99:
**Wanshan District Meteorological Observatory issues blue frost warning signal**

Wanshan District Meteorological Observatory issued a blue frost warning signal at 22:37 on December 31, 2024: It is expected that in the next 24 hours, the lowest temperature in Chadian, Yutang, Xiaxi, Huangdao and other towns (streets) in our district will drop below 0℃, and frost will occur, which will have an impact on agriculture.

**Please pay attention to prevention**:

* The government and agricultural and forestry authorities should make preparations for frost prevention in accordance with their duties;
* Certain protective measures should be taken for crops, vegetables, flowers, fruits, and forestry breeding;
* Rural grassroots organizations and farmers should pay attention to local frost warning information so as to take measures to strengthen protection.

Please pay attention to the latest weather forecast and warning information issued by the meteorological department in a timely manner and take preventive measures.
100:
**Shouning Meteorological Observatory issues a blue frost warning, please take precautions**!

Affected by the cold air, Shouning County Meteorological Observatory issued a blue frost warning signal at 15:54 on December 31, 2024. It is expected that the lowest temperature in our county will reach 0-4℃ from tonight to tomorrow, with frost or freezing.

Please ask the government and agricultural and forestry authorities to make preparations for frost prevention in accordance with their duties, and take certain protective measures for crops, vegetables, flowers, fruits, and forestry breeding. Rural grassroots organizations and farmers should pay attention to local frost warning information so as to take measures to strengthen protection.

Please pay attention to adding clothes to keep warm and take good care of the elderly, the weak, and the sick. Take cold prevention measures for livestock, poultry, tropical and subtropical fruits, related aquatic products, crops, etc. Make preparations for wind prevention.
